featured.text: “I have patchwork pieces that contain all sorts of combinations of fabrics.
When the deer hear a combination of a 3-second- long recording of a deer’s snort and 20 seconds of a barking dog, they panic and flee rapidly.
A combination of sound and visual devices attracts more deer to the tracks.

definition.zh_def: 結合，合併，將兩個或多個事物結合成一個整體的過程或結果。
definition.en_def: The act of combining two or more elements to form a single unit.
definition.example: The combination of different colors created a beautiful painting.
